thread.title: Janice Fulbrook
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Janice Fulbrook

author: Janice Fulbrook
title: Janice Fulbrook
text: I ordered a barbour jacket with Country Attire. When it arrived it had obviously been worn as there was a credit card and lipstick in the pocket. When I phoned Country Attire they said it was the last one in my size so I would need to keep it or return it. I returned the jacket and then had to chase up my refund. Very disappointing experience.
